properties.areaDesc: Whitefish Bay (U.S. Portion)/Whitefish Point to Point Iroquois MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 3:54PM EST until January 8 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 30 kt and highest waves around 11
feet.

* WHERE...Whitefish Bay (U. S. Portion)/Whitefish Point to Point
Iroquois MI.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
